item.description:
New stuff:
The show time is 1:45, so let's meet outside the theater in the welcome scorching heat between 1:15 and 1:30. We'll head in by 1:30.

If you're late or can't make it last minute (or if you RSVPed Maybe and can make it last minute), please call my cell phone: 508/308-4897.

See you all tomorrow!




Old stuff:
Who's excited for Indiana Jones? We are!!!

If you can't wait until June 7 and like drive-ins, you may want to go to this Saturday night's double feature (Indy/Iron Man) at the Mendon drive-in. Scott would love to have you!

Let's meet outside the theater and then go in and buy our discounted tickets together. (Tix are $8.50 each to FMM members and their guests; instead of $10.)

As always, guests are welcome. Just be sure to include them in your RSVP so I know how many people to expect.

We'll go out after the movie to discuss it and chat, if people are game.

My cell number is 508/308-4897 if you need to RSVP last minute (like w/in 2 hours of the show). The exact time of the show will be updated a few days before, as movie times don't come out this far ahead.

My email is dana@framesbydana.com. Email me if you have any questions.

Hope to see you at this summer blockbuster movie!

BTW, if I get enough people RSVPing and saying they'd rather this movie be Saturday night, June 7, I'm fine with moving it to prime time. I want to be democratic about it... Voice your opinion!

--Dana
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Meetup nametag and waiting outside by the parking lot. We'll congregate there, then we'll buy our (discounted) tickets together. I look like my pic on the FMM site.
item.why: We don't bite, we all love movies and we're all looking to make new friends! (Well, some of us bite a little, but it probably won't hurt!)
item.name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
